DOC.brief_summary: Fish oil therapy may decrease incidence cardiac arrhythmia . This study test whether pre-treatment fish oil catheter ablation atrial fibrillation decrease early post operative occurrence atrial fibrillation .
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Vein Isolation Outcomes With Fish Oils
DOC.criteria: Paroxysmal Atrial fibrillation ( PAF ) . Persistent atrial fibrillation . Persistent AF selflimited . Previous pulmonary vein isolation ablation procedure Contraindication anticoagulation Permanent AF Severe valvular pathology Concurrent use antiarrhythmic medication Inability give consent Pregnancy
